misalignments.reasoning: No API endpoint exists to fetch current user information for dashboard display. The dashboard header requires displaying the user's actual name, but there is no endpoint to retrieve current user data. The dashboard code uses hardcoded mock data at src/app/dashboard/page.tsx:41-42

Bulk task operations (clear completed, delete all, toggle all) completely missing. While database transaction functions exist in db.ts, there are no API endpoints or UI elements to perform these operations. Users cannot access these features
